short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed Bitcoin Chrome Wallet: Your lightning-fast companion for seamless Bitcoin transactions and digital payments on the go!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Speed is the most easiest Bitcoin Lightning Chrome wallet for digital payments. Our vision is to make Bitcoin accessible to everyone and help you experience the full power of it.

With the Speed Bitcoin wallet browser extension, paying via Bitcoin on the web is now easier than ever. Send & receive Bitcoin payments on any websites that support Bitcoin payments. 

Simply start with just a few clicks:

1. Easily sign in to your Speed Wallet account, if you do not have an account download our app on your phone from the Play Store or Apple App Store. 
2. Add the extension and pin it for you to easily access it.
3. Just click on the wallet icon and easily make the payment. 

Speed supports both on-chain & lightning network, make payments via LNurl, LN invoice or LN address. 

Enjoy Speed

- Lightning-fast payments: Send & receive instant Bitcoin payments via on-chain or lightning network.
- User experience: Speed offers the best user experience, you will love the simplicity of Speed Wallet for sending and receiving fast Bitcoin payments. It's as easy as sending a message.
- No transaction fee: Speed does not charge any transaction fee to the users. Only a small network fee is charged by the miners to confirm your transaction.
- Custodial wallet: Speed Bitcoin wallet enables you to securely send and receive Bitcoin via both the on-chain and Lightning Network. Secure your account with two-factor authentication.

Put your Bitcoin to work with ease using Speed Bitcoin Wallet for Android. Speed is the most secure crypto wallet for you to hold your Bitcoin and spend easily for everyday services, without worrying about fees.

Follow us on X: https://twitter.com/speedwallet

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/speedbitcoinwallet
